Text: Why do you post these disgustingly ugly skanks? I'm genuinely wondering.

@Sinthyses,
I would genuinely ask you how you could ask such a stupid question? 
A little logic applied can easily answer this.
Beauty is subjective. What I like will be different from what you like and so on and so on for thousands of people. 

How can you possibly expect an uploader to please everyone? All they can do is upload like a mad dog and let the downloader choose what they want for themselves. 

Think of Pro-Lifers - they want to force one single religious belief on everyone. Pro-CHOICE people want options and the ability for each person to decide what is best for them. 

And so the same goes for porn and skanks like this.

In the end, it is best to simply ignore what you don't like but always remember to just say thanks to guys like Bestec regardless. They are here, busting their asses constantly just so you can make your keyboard sticky.

look, whatever floats your boat, that's fine. i can't be the only one though, that is annoyed by having to wade through several pages of ATK hambeasts and crackwhores to find anyone else's postings. i'm not saying bestec1234 should stop posting. i'm just saying maybe he could make some room for everyone else's posts by putting more sets in each post or something. seriously there are like 8 non atk posts in the first five pages of this category. it's a little bit overkill.
also, beauty is subjective, but it's not that subjective. these are pigs.

Imagine how empty this section would be without Bestec doing his thing. 

Again, I understand that is how you feel...but...that is how YOU feel. He has a green skull which means he is VIP. So if the cool dudes behind the scenes at TPB have no problem with his methods..........

@Sinthyses because I say please and thank you. Also I hang in the irc channel. Lastly because I request them and bestec1234 is kind enough to share for everyone. If you don't like, don't download. I would prefer fewer anorexic Barbie lookalike barf beasts.

@Sinthyses because they are requested, and because the requester says please, and thank you. Also because bestec1234 is kind enough to share. Last because some of us are tired of anorexic Barbie lookalike barf beasts.

I post models that have been requested by someone.  You can request models that you like on Suprbay or in the IRC channel.

I split my torrents up because of torrent file size limitations here at TPB.  I stopped posting for quite a while back when the bug was introduced, as I searched for the best way to continue posting despite the problem.
